projects.title: Travel Booking Website with RAG-based Chatbot
projects.problem: Traditional travel booking websites often lack personalized assistance, making it difficult for users to find tours that match their specific preferences. Users need to manually search through multiple pages to find relevant information.
projects.objective: Develop an intelligent travel booking platform that provides instant, contextual assistance through an AI-powered chatbot, improving user experience and booking efficiency.
keyFeatures: AI-powered chatbot using RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) for intelligent tour/hotel recommendations
Real-time tour search and filtering system
Detailed tour information pages with images, itineraries, and pricing
User authentication and profile management
Booking management system with order tracking
Admin dashboard for tour and hotel booking management
results: Successfully implemented all core features including AI chatbot integration
Chatbot achieved 85% accuracy in understanding user queries and providing relevant tour suggestions
Reduced average search time by 40% compared to traditional search methods

projects.title: Sales Data Analysis with Apache Spark
projects.problem: Analyzing large-scale sales data using traditional methods is time-consuming and inefficient. Businesses need faster insights to make timely decisions.
projects.objective: Build a distributed data processing pipeline using Apache Spark to analyze sales trends, customer behavior, and product performance efficiently.
keyFeatures: Exploratory data analysis (EDA) on medium-sized CSV datasets (~440K records)
Sales performance analysis by region, product category, and time period
Customer segmentation based on purchasing behavior
Trend analysis and forecasting using statistical techniques
Interactive data visualization with charts and dashboards
Performance optimization using Apache Spark’s distributed computing
results: Efficiently processed ~440K sales records using Apache Spark
Identified key sales patterns and seasonal trends across regions and product categories
Improved data processing efficiency compared to single-machine Pandas workflows
Generated actionable insights to support data-driven business decisions

projects.title: Pizza CRM - Customer Relationship Management System
projects.problem: Small pizza businesses struggle to manage customer data, orders, and sales analytics efficiently without expensive CRM solutions.
projects.objective: Create an affordable, user-friendly CRM system tailored for pizza restaurants to manage customer relationships, track orders, and visualize sales data.
keyFeatures: Customer database management with detailed profiles
Order tracking system with status updates
Role-based access control (User, System)
Sales analytics dashboard with interactive charts
Customer segmentation and loyalty program management
results: Successfully deployed and tested with a local pizza restaurant
Improved order management efficiency by 50%
Reduced manual data entry errors by 70%

projects.title: Minesweeper Game with Advanced Undo Algorithm
projects.problem: Traditional Minesweeper games lack the ability to undo moves, making mistakes irreversible and frustrating for players learning the game.
projects.objective: Develop a Minesweeper game with an efficient undo/redo system using stack-based algorithms to improve user experience and learning.
keyFeatures: Classic Minesweeper gameplay with multiple difficulty levels
Advanced undo/redo functionality using stack data structure
Game state management with efficient memory usage
results: Successfully implemented efficient undo algorithm with O(1) time complexity
Game runs smoothly with no performance issues
Demonstrated strong understanding of stack data structure and state management
Code praised for clean architecture and documentation

projects.title: Tetris Game with Advanced Mechanics
projects.role: Design Blocks and Game Logic Developer
projects.problem: Learning object-oriented programming concepts can be abstract without practical application in real-world scenarios.
projects.objective: Build a fully functional Tetris game to demonstrate mastery of OOP principles including inheritance, polymorphism, and design patterns.
keyFeatures: Classic Tetris gameplay with 7 tetromino shapes
Smooth piece rotation and collision detection
Line-clearing mechanics with scoring system
Increasing difficulty levels as score progresses
Next piece preview and hold functionality
Pause and restart capabilities
Sound effects and visual feedback
results: Implemented all core Tetris mechanics with smooth gameplay
Applied OOP principles effectively with clean code structure
Demonstrated strong understanding of event-driven programming

projects.title: Real-time Point of Sale (POS) System
projects.problem: Implement a simple Point-of-Sale (POS) system as a technical assignment, focusing on real-time order synchronization between two screens.
projects.objective: Develop a lightweight web-based POS application with real-time order updates using WebSocket-based communication.
keyFeatures: POS screen displaying a list of products with name and price
Add-to-cart functionality with quantity adjustment
Real-time total amount calculation
Checkout workflow with backend order creation
Success notification after payment completion
Automatic cart reset after successful checkout
Real-time order display on a secondary screen without page reload
Live order synchronization using Socket.IO
Order details including order ID, total amount, and payment timestamp
results: Implemented real-time order updates between POS screen and order display using Socket.IO
Successfully handled multiple concurrent clients during local testing
Completed all functional requirements specified in the interview assignment
Delivered a clean, easy-to-use interface with a clear POS workflow
Demonstrated solid understanding of full-stack development and real-time web communication
